title: Barista Coffee opens 350th store in Udaipur, plans to reach the count of 500 in 2 years
description: â€œAt Barista, we are expanding our footprint across the country in a strategic manner and plan to be at 500 store count over the next 2 years. The objective is to connect with the larger community and be accessible for our consumers at multiple touch points," the company CEO said.
